fr.upmc.components.pre.reflection.connectors

Class ReflectionConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.components.pre.reflection.connectors.ReflectionConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, ReflectionI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ReflectionConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements ReflectionI
    The class ReflectionConnector defines the connector associated the interface ReflectionI.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : February 25, 2016

      • isPortConnected

        public boolean isPortConnected(java.lang.String portURI)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ReflectionI
        true if the port with the given URI is connected, false otherwise.

        Contract

         pre    portURI != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        isPortConnected in interface ReflectionI
        Parameters:
        portURI - URI of the component's port.
        Returns:
        true if the port with the given URI is connected.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if such a port does not exist in the component.
        See Also:
        ReflectionI.isPortConnected(java.lang.String)

      • doPortConnection

        public void doPortConnection(java.lang.String portURI,
                             java.lang.String otherPortURI,
                             java.lang.String ccname)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ReflectionI
        connect the component port to another component's port using the specified type of connector.

        Contract

         pre    portURI != null && otherPortURI != null && ccname != null
 pre    !this.isPortConnected(String portURI)
 post   this.isPortConnected(String portURI)
        Specified by:
        doPortConnection in interface ReflectionI
        Parameters:
        portURI - URI of the component's port to be connected.
        otherPortURI - URI of the other port to be connected with.
        ccname - connector class name to be used in the connection.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        ReflectionI.doPortConnection(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

        Contract

 pre    this.isPortConnected(String portURI)
 post   !this.isPortConnected(String portURI)
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
